content.text:
# Chao (monarchy)

Chao () is a title of the Lan Na royal family members.
Chao Kan Har Bai7
"Chao Kan Har Bai" (เจ้าห้าขันใบ, ) It is a royal title for high-ranking royal family members in each 5 principality of Lanna.
After the collapse of the absolute monarchy of Siam, the royal family system was abolished by the People's Party  (Khana Ratsadon - คณะราษฎร). Currently, all descendants of the royal family use the surnames Na Chiang Mai, Na Lamphun, Na Lampang, and Na Nan.
* Chao Kan Har Bai Consists of 5 positions as follows
*# Chao Luang (เจ้าหลวง)   The Ruler of the state. is the highest post in the 5 Lan Na  Principalitys.
*# Chao Uparaja (เจ้าอุปราช)   The Viceroy of the State and the Heir to the Throne
*# Chao Rajawong (เจ้าราชวงศ์) - Son of Chao Luang.
*# Chao Burirat (เจ้าบุรีรัตน์) - Son of Chao Luang.
*# Chao Rajabute (เจ้าราชบุตร) - Son of Chao Luang.
